changeSet.id: Replace cp short title with cp id as key in key sequence generator table
changeSet.sql: update key_seq_generator ksg join catissue_collection_protocol cp on ksg.key_value = cp.short_title set ksg.key_value = cp.identifier where ksg.key_type = 'PPID';

changeSet.author: vlonushte
changeSet.id: Replace cp short title with cp id as key in key sequence generator table
changeSet.sql: merge into key_seq_generator ksg using ( select k.identifier as key_id, cp.identifier as cp_id from key_seq_generator k join catissue_collection_protocol cp on k.key_value = cp.short_title where k.key_type = 'PPID' ) t on (ksg.identifier = t.key_id) when matched then update set ksg.key_value = t.cp_id
